summary: On the glorious battlefields of the American Revolution, two great generals distinguished themselves; George Washington and Benedict Arnold. Washington is remembered as America's founding ... See full summary »
cast: Aidan Quinn|Kelsey Grammer|Flora Montgomery|John Light|John Kavanagh|Tom Murphy|Jane Brennan|Anthony Brophy|Frank Coughlan|Ingrid Craigie|Donncha Crowley|Mark Davis|Ned Dennehy|Nick Dunning|James Flynn|Michael Ford|Adam Goodwin|Stephen Hogan|Rory Keenan|Mark Lambert|Allen Leech|Demien McAdam|James Joseph McDonald|Cal Mulcahy|Finn Mulcahy|Lochlann O'Mearáin|Eamonn Owens|Ben Palmer|Robert Price|Dylan Quinn
title: Benedict Arnold: A Question of Honor
